== Selfmade Gaming Console ==

==== Overview ====
This project describes how to build a gaming console with Ubuntu as OS and many open source games to play. 

==== Goals ====
* O/S: Ubuntu
* no specific hardware requirement. could be build withe an Barebone, Netbook or old PC
* complete controls via Gamepad
* No Keyboard usage
* Connect to TV screen
* Open source games from the Ubuntu repositories

==== Issues ====
* How to control the Linux-Desktop (Unity) completely via gamepad.
* Create a list of suitable games
* e.g. Implement an on screen keyboard

==== Roadmap ====
* 1. Design stage - Brainstorming
